Total number of trees (represented as unique polygons) by tract. Derived from polygon data digitized as trees from Lidar raw sonar data

column4: made available through the Regional Trees Initiative and U.S. Forest Service
column7: and aggregated to census tract scale by the Health Regions & Policies Lab.

Description: Percentage of total census tract area covered by tree polygons (with each polygon representing the tree crown
column3: or maximum tree crown width). Derived from polygon data digitized as trees from Lidar raw sonar data
column4: originally processed by the Spatial Analysis Laboratory

column8: and aggregated to census tract scale by the Health Regions & Policies Lab.

Description: Social Vulnerability Index via CDC using 2018 ACS 5-year data.
Economic Hardship Index
column3: calculated using 2018 ACS 5-year data using standard approach using six components (unemployment
column8: poverty) by Center for Spatial Data Science.

Description: Urban flood susceptibility index

Measure of land surface temperature to approximate the heat island effect. 1km grid raw data aggregated to census tract scale using average of grid values. Values close to 1 represent grid cells that have high summer temperatures relative to all other cells in the Chicago area; values closer to 0 represent lower values. Derived from mean Land Surface Temperature (LST) collected by NASAâ€™s MODIS satellite (MOD11 dataset).
Logged traffic volume
column3: using street segment volume from IDOT.

Description: Average PM 2.5 estimates during summer (Jun-Aug) from 2014-2018
column3: calculated using a neural network model via Center for Spatial Data Science.

Description: Number of Emergency Dept. asthma visits (age 0-18) between 2013-2018
column3: calculated at the zip code and shared via the Chicago Health Atlas.

Description: Age adjusted rate of Emergency Dept. asthma visits (age 0-18) between 2013-2018
column3: calculated at the zip code and shared via the Chicago Health Atlas.
